data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 7, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
In the minute 9, Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Fortaleza needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fluminense just outside Fortaleza's area.
In the minute 12, In Fortaleza, Michel Araujo (Fluminense) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 14, In Fortaleza Fluminense drive forward through Ganso. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Fortaleza.
Fluminense push upfield but Marielson Alves Silva quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
In the minute 21, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Throw-in high up the field for Fluminense in Fortaleza.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Caio Paulista (Fluminense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 33, Marielson Alves Silva awards the home team a throw-in.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Fluminense's Caio Paulista misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 35, Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Free kick Fortaleza.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 37, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a Fluminense throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Free kick Fluminense.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 39, Fortaleza's Yuri Cesar has been booked in Fortaleza.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 41, Fluminense to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Fluminense's Hudson gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Fortaleza are pushing forward but Yuri Cesar's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
The first-half is over.
Marielson Alves Silva has blown to start the second-half.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 46, Rogerio Ceni (Fortaleza) is making a first substitution, with Tinga replacing Ronald.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 48, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Marielson Alves Silva.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a throw-in for Fortaleza, close to Fluminense's area.
Free kick in a good position for Fortaleza!
In the minute 51, Felipe (Fortaleza) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
In the minute 53, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Can Fluminense capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 55, At Estadio Castelao, Roger Carvalho is shown a red card and sent off.
Rogerio Ceni is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Castelao with Marlon replacing Romarinho.
Danilo Barcelos (Fluminense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 63, Fortaleza's Juninho breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Marielson Alves Silva awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Igor Juliao is booked for the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
The away team have replaced Caio Paulista with Wellington Silva. This is the first substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 67, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jackson (Fortaleza) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
Osvaldo is on a sub for Yuri Cesar for Fortaleza.
In the minute 72, Fluminense attack but Felippe Cardoso's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Marcos Paulo is replacing Michel Araujo for Fluminense at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 72, The away team replace Felippe Cardoso with Lucca.
Throw-in Fluminense.
In Fortaleza, Luccas Claro (Fluminense) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 75, Wellington Silva scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Fluminense.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 78, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Mariano Vazquez is replacing Felipe for the home team.
In the minute 80, Free kick Fluminense.
Fortaleza make their fifth substitution with Bergson replacing David.
Marlon (Fortaleza) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 82, Fluminense drive upfield and Yago Felipe gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fortaleza defender.
Throw-in Fortaleza.
Marielson Alves Silva awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fluminense's Marcos Paulo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Marielson Alves Silva signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
The away team have replaced Hudson with Yuri Lima. This is the fourth substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
